researchers.post: F.Y.I…I have a tape recording taken from a Shroud exhibition in BC in 2006 where Rev. Dreisbach was the sole presenter. Rev. Dreisbach speaks about the finding of travertine arogonite on the tip of the nose and knees of the man of the Shroud. It was an unforgettable presentation for many reasons, but this is where I learned first about the soil findings on the Shroud. C. Wharton.
researchers.title: Guscin, Dreisbach and the Risk of Dot-Dot-Dotting
